Sentencas: The development of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) offers new perspectives, in particular as auxiliary power units for vehicle applications.
Titulo: Reduction in the operating temperature of solid oxide fuel cells - Potential use in transport applications

Sentencas: The elaboration of thin electrolyte layers is the main challenge in order to reduce their operating temperature.
Titulo: Reduction in the operating temperature of solid oxide fuel cells - Potential use in transport applications

Sentencas: A brief review of the deposition techniques and of the potential electrolytes is presented.
Titulo: Reduction in the operating temperature of solid oxide fuel cells - Potential use in transport applications

Sentencas: A relatively new technique, Atomic Layer Deposition (ALD), allows to produce thin, dense and homogeneous layers, i.e. zirconia or zirconia-based thin layers can be deposited on different substrates.
Titulo: Reduction in the operating temperature of solid oxide fuel cells - Potential use in transport applications

Sentencas: The interest of elaborating bi- or multilayer electrolytes is outlined.
Titulo: Reduction in the operating temperature of solid oxide fuel cells - Potential use in transport applications
